attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877277357. The Honda BR-V comes with the remaining balance of it's 5 year/200 000 km Warranty. It has auto air conditioning, rear air conditioning vents, it has the ability to seat 7 passengers comfortably, and many more other features.
This BR-V is new. The Honda BR-V is the most fuel-efficient car in its segment. This BR-V is perfect for long distance trips. The first and the second rows seats are very comfortable with plenty of headroom and legroom to spare. Please note that our selling price excludes our admin, license and registration fee.
